name: Project: Red
blurb: Experience a world and story unlike any other! This is a passion project made with a deep love for games. For gamers, by gamers.

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANK YOU EDITION\u2014This reward is for those who simply want to show their support for the project. Get your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, as well as exclusive access to our forum, where you can find out about updates and ask questions to the team.

This is promotional basis of our project. We are looking for 5000 people to just give $10 and we will be fully funded. Incentive for this reward is a first look at the game with action packed trailers, interviews, and updates sent right to your inbox. Become a part of something larger!! Support Project: Red

EARLY BIRD EDITION\u2014This reward is available only to the first \u201cProject: Red\u201d backers. You will received a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game for Windows or Mac OSX, as well as your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, and exclusive access to our funders exclusive forum. In addition, this reward tier will give you BETA ACCESS to the game during development. First 100 Supporters receive a RETAIL COPY of the final game.

BASE EDITION - This is the tier for our main support. The people who want to see this project become a reality! All rewards from previous tier are included as well as a DIGITAL COPY of the final game and BETA ACCESS!

DOUBLE EDITION - This is the reward for you and a friend. Give the gift of rewards and receive one yourself. Includes TWO of everything above plus special edition digital WALLPAPERS to remind you of your support.
SOUND EDITION - This is the best way to show your support for Project: Red. In exchange receive our original SOUNDTRACK with your support.

SPECIAL EDITION - Only available to the first 100 supporters. Includes everything from the above tiers as well as RETAIL COPY of the game and SOUNDTRACK CD with an EXCLUSIVE BONUS TRACK not included with the normal CD. And the first half of our CONCEPT, OUTLINE, and STORYLINE EBOOK.
BACKGROUND EDITION - Learn about the process from beginning to end with the first half of our EBOOK. Includes Everything from the previous tier.

CREATIVITY EDITION - This reward brings you a first  look at the art that inspires the rest of the game! Including over 30 pages of sketches color drawings and computer generated graphics. In our DIGITAL ARTBOOK. Another bonus to this tier is the 2nd part of our conceptual EBOOK to bring you closer to the story and development of the game.

VALUE EDITION - Brings you everything from the previous tiers with the exclusive BONUS TRACK. A digital STRATEGY GUIDE and RETAIL COPY of the final game. Get the most reward for your money with this tier!
STRATEGY EDITION - For those looking for a physical PRINTED STRATEGY GUIDE to gameplay in Project : Red
REMEMBER EDITION - Receive a SIGNATURE MOUSE PAD to keep your support for our project close at home. includes everything from previous tiers as well.

CHARACTER EDITION - First look at naming a character in the game, one of the only tiers with this exclusive offer! Only 15 spots available!! Included specially in this game is the printed edition of both EBOOKS.
WEARABLE EDITION - Selectable T-SHIRT Designs available here! 3 Designs to choose from in all sizes! Shipped with a physical copy of the SOUNDTRACK CD.
COLLECTORS EDITION - Everything from previous tiers in an exclusive collectors box only available here.
PRINT EDITION - Comes with everything above plus the printed hard copies of EBOOK, STRATEGY GUIDE, and the printed full color ARTBOOK!

DELUXE EDITION - Limited edition with everything included and the opportunity to add to the game in a personal way including your choice of naming anything in the game or having your choice of graphic on a billboard in game.

IN GAME EDITION - Bring the game to life for you personally by getting a 3d model of yourself as a character encountered in the game! This tier is a way to show your support by going all in for Project: Red!

INVESTED TIER - Show your love and support for Project: Red with a huge donation!! Rewards are on the table and included two of everything offered in above tiers as well as an exclusive chance to meet the team over a Skype call or in person - (US only).

We are looking for at least one person, team, or business to support this tier. Our ULTIMATE PACKAGE TIER. Show your love and support and we will show ours back with exclusive deals, rewards, calls, be a part of the major influence thrown into the game! And we will show your enormous support with a beginning credits animation with what you would like to tell the people playing the game.
